```{r}
library(readr)
libraryData <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tpemartin/github-data/master/library100_102.csv")
```

```{r}
levels(as.factor(libraryData$學號)) -> student
answer <- vector("numeric",3867)
for( i in c(1:3867)) {
student_i <- student[i]
a <- libraryData[which(libraryData$學號 == student_i),]
nrow(a) -> answer[i]}
which(answer == max(answer)) %>%
  student[.]
```

```{r}
library(dplyr) ; library(lubridate)
levels(as.factor(libraryData$學號)) -> student
ymd_hms(libraryData$借閱時間) -> libraryData$借閱時間
answer <- vector("character",3867)
for(i in c(1:3867)) {
  student_i <- student[i]
  a <- libraryData[which(libraryData$學號==student_i),]
  as.character(min(a$借閱時間)) -> answer[i]
  data.frame(
    學號 = student, 
    最早借閱時間 = answer
  ) -> b }
```

```{r}
library(dplyr);library(lubridate)
levels(as.factor(libraryData$學號)) -> student
ymd_hms(libraryData$借閱時間) -> libraryData$借閱時間
answer <- vector("character",3867)
for(i in c(1:3867)) {
  student_i <- student[i]
  a <- libraryData[which(libraryData$學號==student_i),]
  min(a$借閱時間) -> answer[i]}
```

```{r}
data <- data.frame(year = rep(2016:2017,6),month = seq(1:12),sales=rep(c(10,20,30,40),3))
planes <- group_by(data, year)
delay <- summarise(planes,
                   count = n(),                #个数
                   max_mon = max(month),       #最大值
                   min_mon = min(month),       #最小值
                   avg_sales = mean(sales),    #平均值
                   sum_sales = sum(sales))
```
